name: 王謹誠
objective:
車輛空氣動力學理論基礎，空氣動力學特性，汽車空氣動力風阻與特性，及車輛空氣動力設計要點。
Introduction of automobile aerodynamics, some aerodynamics fundamentals, aerodynamic drag of passenger cars, and design features.
